client.name: Order of Chartered Accountants and Accounting Export of Monza and Brianza
client.description: The ODCECMB is the institution that coordinates the relationship between the accountants of the province of Monza and Brianza with the nation-wide Council.

description: I lead the design of the entire application and the development of the frontend.
The application allows the Board of the Order to track all the employees activities and precisely calculate costs, so that they can be charged to the proper commissioner.
